name: Deepwood Memories
title: Knowledge of the Vine: Deepwood Memories
desc: "For all those who follow nature must pass through the maze of the forest and reach that endless plain."
in_play_description: When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Skill: Spend 1 less Dendro Die. (Once per Round) Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be Dendro.

skills.desc: When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Skill: Spend 1 less Dendro Die. (Once per Round) Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be Dendro. (A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
